newsitem.title: USA: Brandywine files for 1.7 mln shr offering.
newsitem.headline: Brandywine files for 1.7 mln shr offering.

text.p: Real Estate investment trust Brandywine Realty Trust said Monday it had filed for a public offering of 1.75 million common shares with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
The company said it planned to use the proceeds from the offering to buy 10 properties and repay advances under its revolving line of credit.
It said it had signed an agreement to buy seven office buildings in Voorhees, New Jersey for about $21.5 million.
It also said it had signed other deals to buy an office building in East Goshen Township, Pennsylvania and two industrial facilities in King of Prussia, Pennsylvania.
The company said its funds from operations for the fourth quarter ended December 31 totalled $1.3 million or $0.32 a share, compared to $84,000 or $0.13 per share a year ago.
